name: MyMAPS
description: Comprehensive geospatial resource-sharing platform, offering access to data, maps, and applications designed to support Government Agencies (G2G), Academia, Local Authorities, and State Governments.
geotopics: Geographical Information Systems (ISO 19115:2003: Location, ImageryBaseMapsEarthCover, Boundaries, PlanningCadastre, Environment, Health, Transportation, Structure, InlandWaters, Oceans)
